about_the_game:
The official soundtrack of Mutropolis.

An enviromental and immersive soundtrack, featuring 24 tracks of original music composed by Pablo Gonzalez.

To access the soundtrack from Steam: select 'Mutropolis' -> right click -> 'Manage' -> 'Browse local files'. The soundtrack comes as 320kbps mp3 and in addition as uncompressed WAV and FLAC if you activated "high quality audio" in your download settings.
